title: How to get image datasets - Quora

response.answer_text: I would refer you to Jeremy Howard’s fast.ai · Making neural nets uncool again MOOC course (the third version). Specifically the discussion board and community platform, in correspondence to the first and second courses: Tips for building large image datasetsGenerating image datasets quicklyHow to scrape the web for images?You won’t be disappointed in the slightest bit.
For getting Image datasets Refer Kaggle, where you can easily find and access many datasets including image datasets such as cats and dogs dataset ,etc.
